item.title: 贸易战现实迎接休假归来的中国交易员
item.description: 周三市场重新开盘前，中国交易员人心惶惶，因为与美国的贸易战重燃，动摇了投资格局。【原文：Chinese traders are on tenterhooks ahead of Wednesday’s market reopen as the resumption of a trade war with the US shakes up the investment landscape.】

item.title: 泰国考虑切断缅甸电力供应，打击诈骗中心
item.description: 泰国正在寻求切断与网络诈骗活动有关联的缅甸城镇的电力供应，这是在一名中国演员被高调贩运，使泰国边境的犯罪活动成为焦点之后行动的升级。【原文：Thailand is looking to cut power supply to Myanmar towns with links to cyber scam operations, escalating actions after a high-profile trafficking of a Chinese actor put a spotlight on criminal activities across the Thai borders.】

item.title: 瑞银自 2023 年瑞士信贷收购以来已裁员 1 万人
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）自收购瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）以来，已裁减了 10,000 多个职位，这是瑞银集团整合前竞争对手的一个里程碑。【原文：UBS Group AG has cut more than 10,000 roles since it bought Credit Suisse, marking a milestone in the lender’s efforts to integrate its former rival.】

item.title: 盖茨支持的 KoBold 公司开始在纳米比亚寻找电池金属
item.description: 由比尔-盖茨（Bill Gates）和山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）等亿万富翁支持的KoBold金属公司正在纳米比亚这个不以生产电池金属而闻名的国家寻找电池金属。【原文：KoBold Metals Co., backed by billionaires including Bill Gates and Sam Altman, is extending its search for battery metals to Namibia, a country not known for producing the minerals.】

item.title: 土耳其财政部长称里拉将继续实际升值
item.description: 土耳其财政部长表示，按通胀调整后的汇率计算，里拉将继续走强，并重申进一步放缓物价增长速度是 "当务之急"。【原文：Turkey’s finance minister signaled the lira will continue strengthening in inflation-adjusted terms and reiterated that slowing price-growth further was the “top priority.”】

item.title: 世界银行因能源和物流因素上调南非国内生产总值预测
item.description: 世界银行上调了对南非经济增长的预测，原因是南非能源和物流业持续复苏，但同时警告说，南非将难以达到减少贫困和失业所需的扩张速度。【原文：The World Bank raised its economic-growth forecast for South Africa because of a sustained recovery in its energy and logistics sectors, while warning that the nation will struggle to achieve a pace of expansion needed to reduce poverty and unemployment.】

item.title: 瑞银集团首席执行官警告市场不要将关税带来的通胀计算在内
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂（Sergio Ermotti）警告说，市场可能没有充分反映美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税所带来的通胀风险。【原文：UBS Group AG Chief Executive Officer Sergio Ermotti warned that markets may not fully reflect the inflationary risk posed by US President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 准备金激增，德国莱弗森银行九年来首次出现亏损
item.description: Raiffeisen Bank International AG 公布了九年来首次季度净亏损，此前该公司被迫拨出 8.4 亿欧元以应对俄罗斯法院的不利裁决。【原文：Raiffeisen Bank International AG posted its first quarterly net loss in nine years after it was forced to set aside €840 million to deal with an adverse court ruling in Russia.】

item.title: 世创电子材料因半导体需求减少股息而下跌
item.description: 世创电子材料股份有限公司（Siltronic AG）以芯片制造客户需求疲软为由，削减了股息并推迟了 2028 年的目标，随后股价暴跌。【原文：Siltronic AG shares plunged after the company cut its dividend and delayed 2028 targets, citing weak demand from chipmaking customers.】

item.title: 什么是麻疹痘，它如何传播，可以治疗吗？
item.description: 40 多年前在全球范围内根除天花是公共卫生史上最伟大的成就之一，消灭了至少困扰人类 3000 年之久的致死、致盲和毁容病因。【原文：The global eradication of smallpox more than 40 years ago was one of the greatest achievements in public health history, vanquishing a cause of death, blindness and disfigurement that had plagued humanity for at least 3,000 years.】

item.title: 埃及私营部门增长回升至 2020 年末以来最佳水平
item.description: 衡量埃及非石油私营部门业绩的一项关键指标创下了四年多来的最高水平，表明埃及经济在经历了一场严峻的经济危机造成的长期低迷之后出现了初步复苏。【原文：A key indicator of the performance of Egypt’s non-oil private sector hit its highest level in more than four years, signaling a tentative recovery after a grueling economic crisis caused a protracted slump.】

item.title: 中美贸易战升级震荡市场，比特币下滑
item.description: 周二，随着美国和中国相互征收新的关税，世界两大经济体之间的贸易紧张局势加剧，比特币和其他数字资产再次面临抛售压力。【原文：Bitcoin and other digital assets faced renewed selling pressure on Tuesday as trade tensions between the world’s two largest economies intensified, with the US and China imposing fresh tariffs on each other.】

item.title: 会议记录显示，韩国央行成员担心降息可能削弱韩元走势
item.description: 1 月 16 日的会议纪要显示，由于担心连续第三次下调基准利率可能会刺激韩元进一步走软，韩国央行的一些董事会成员上个月决定按兵不动。【原文：Concerns that a third consecutive cut to the benchmark rate might spur further weakening of the South Korean won persuaded some Bank of Korea board members to keep policy on hold last month, minutes from their Jan. 16 meeting showed.】

item.title: 印度国有贷款机构将推出工具以缓解小额贷款的借贷压力
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，印度国家基础设施与发展融资银行（NaBFID）计划为利用废物生产能源的地方市政公司提供信贷服务。【原文：India’s National Bank for Financing Infrastructure and Development or NaBFID plans to unveil a credit facility for local municipal corporations that seek to produce energy using waste, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Bajaj Finserv 与 Allianz 就可能退出合资公司进行谈判
item.description: 印度金融服务公司 Bajaj Finserv Ltd. 仍在与德国安联集团（Allianz SE）商谈分拆双方的寿险和产险合资企业，以寻求对这些业务更大的控制权。【原文：Bajaj Finserv Ltd. is still talking to Germany’s Allianz SE to part ways in their life and general insurance joint ventures, as the Indian financial services firm seeks greater control of the businesses.】

item.title: 戴比尔斯首席执行官称美国钻石需求出现复苏迹象
item.description: 戴比尔斯称，圣诞节前有迹象表明美国钻石需求回升，而印度已超过中国成为第二大市场。【原文：De Beers said there were signs of a pick up in US diamond demand before Christmas, while India has overtaken China to become the second-biggest market.】

item.title: 法国国家财政赤字较小，预算困境有所缓解
item.description: 法国的核心国家预算赤字在 2024 年有所收窄，这为政府在修复公共财政的角力中巩固政权提供了一些宽慰。【原文：France’s core state budget deficit narrowed in 2024, offering the government some relief as it clings to power in a tussle over repairing public finances.】

item.title: 伊拉克称正采取措施恢复重要石油出口管道
item.description: 伊拉克石油部长海扬-阿卜杜勒-加尼（Hayyan Abdul Ghani）表示，一旦从该国北部通往土耳其的输油管道恢复运营，伊拉克计划每天至少出口 30 万桶原油。【原文：Iraq is planning to export at least 300,000 barrels a day of crude oil once operations resume at a pipeline from the country’s north to Turkey that’s been shut for almost two years, oil minister Hayyan Abdul Ghani said.】

item.title: 泰国游客人数增长 21%，中国游客居首位
item.description: 自今年年初以来，泰国的外国游客人数猛增了 21%，因为在一名中国演员被高调贩卖到邻国缅甸的非法呼叫中心工作之后，游客们基本上都忽略了安全问题。【原文：Thailand saw foreign tourist arrivals jump 21% since the start of the year as visitors largely ignored safety concerns following the high-profile trafficking of a Chinese actor to work in an illegal call center in neighboring Myanmar.】

item.title: 沃达丰第三季度销售额超预期，英国和非洲市场表现强劲
item.description: 由于英国和非洲市场的强劲增长，沃达丰集团公司第三季度的服务收入超出预期。【原文：Vodafone Group Plc’s service revenue beat expectations in the company’s third quarter thanks to strong growth in the UK and Africa.】

item.title: 这些是中国征收关税的所有美国商品
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对来自北京的商品征收 10%的关税后不久，中国对一系列美国产品征收了新的关税。以下是中方声明的翻译版本。【原文：China imposed new tariffs on a range of US products moments after President Donald Trump slapped a 10% tariff on goods from Beijing. Here is translated version of the Chinese statement.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市有望因关税忧虑而延续跌势
任天堂下调 Switch 2 上市前最后几个月的业绩展望
item.description: 任天堂公司（Nintendo Co., Ltd.）在假日期间利润和收入大幅下滑后，下调了全年业绩预期，因为玩家越来越期待其下一代游戏机的发布。【原文：Nintendo Co. revised its full-year forecast down after profit and revenue plummeted over the holiday period, with gamers increasingly looking forward to the release of its next-generation console.】

item.title: 英飞凌季度销售预测超过分析师预期
item.description: 英飞凌科技公司（Infineon Technologies AG）预测的季度营收超过分析师预期，这家德国芯片制造商正努力摆脱长期的行业低迷。【原文：Infineon Technologies AG forecast quarterly revenue ahead of analyst estimates, as the German chipmaker struggles to emerge from a prolonged industry slump.】

item.title: 分析师称，中国的关税报复迄今为止似乎有所克制
item.description: 在中美两国采取最新的针锋相对的贸易措施后，金融市场迅速收敛了最初的波动，因为中国政府采取的措施似乎很有分寸。【原文：Financial markets quickly pared their initial moves following the latest tit-for-tat trade measures between the US and China as the steps from Beijing seemed quite measured, analysts say.】

item.title: 阳狮集团首席执行官认为宏盟集团和英特公共集团合并将带来上升空间
item.description: 阳狮集团（Publicis Groupe SA）首席执行官表示，竞争对手宏盟集团（Omnicom Group Inc.【原文：The chief executive officer of Publicis Groupe SA said the merger of rivals Omnicom Group Inc. and Interpublic Group could be good for business, with less competition for key customers and more talent available to poach.】

item.title: 泰国考虑进口更多美国商品以减少贸易顺差
item.description: 一位政府官员表示，泰国将增加对美国乙烷和农产品的进口，以防止在特朗普政府以贸易战威胁各国时对其出口导向型经济造成损害。【原文：Thailand is set to increase imports of US ethane and agricultural products, a government official said, in a bid to prevent damage to its export-driven economy as the Trump administration threatens countries with trade wars.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行计划回购 11 亿美元，交易强劲提升利润
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）宣布回购新股并派发高于预期的股息，因为去年最后几个月交易收入的激增使利润超过了目标。【原文：BNP Paribas SA announced a new share buyback and higher-than-expected dividend after a surge in trading revenue in the final months of last year lifted profit above its targets.】

item.title: Amundi 资产突破 2.2 万亿欧元，首席执行官预计将有更多资金流入
item.description: Amundi SA 报告本季度资金流入再创佳绩，并表示 2025 年将继续保持这一速度。【原文：Amundi SA reported another bumper quarter of inflows and said it should be able to keep up the pace in 2025.】

item.title: Centerbridge 校友拉姆创办房地产公司 Everview Partners
item.description: 曾在 Centerbridge Partners 负责房地产业务的比利-拉姆（Billy Rahm）成立了 Everview Partners，该公司专注于投资北美地区的房地产企业。【原文：Billy Rahm, who oversaw real estate at Centerbridge Partners, has launched Everview Partners, a firm focused on investing in real assets businesses in North America.】
